creator: Zap
descriptionHtml:
Onboard in under 30 seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Link a bank account to deposit funds and let us do the rest.

Remittance Payments
Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
Strike allows users to withdraw funds from Strike to their bank account. As a merchant, you can now accept bitcoin as payment and withdraw your funds as fiat. You are never exposed to price volatility or taxes because you never custody anything besides US dollars.

What do people use Strike for?
• Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in Strike and more bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in Strike and less bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.
• Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike by taking industry-leading security measure to protect you and your account.
• Supporting our user's matter. We have a stellar customer support team staffed with kindhearted individuals. We are here to help, always.

With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
Strike allows users to withdraw funds from Strike to their bank account. As a merchant, you can now accept bitcoin as payment and withdraw your funds as fiat. You are never exposed to price volatility or taxes because you never custody anything besides US dollars.

What do people use Strike for?
• Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in Strike and more bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in Strike and less bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.
• Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.

Strike allows users to withdraw funds from Strike to their bank account. As a merchant, you can now accept bitcoin as payment and withdraw your funds as fiat. You are never exposed to price volatility or taxes because you never custody anything besides US dollars.

What do people use Strike for?
• Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in Strike and more bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in Strike and less bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.
• Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike by taking industry-leading security measures to protect you and your account.
• Supporting our user's matters. We have a stellar customer support team staffed with kindhearted individuals. We are here to help, always.

Strike allows users to withdraw funds from Strike to their bank account. As a merchant, you can now accept bitcoin as payment and withdraw your funds as fiat. You are never exposed to price volatility or taxes because you never custody anything besides US dollars.

What do people use Strike for?
• Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in Strike and more bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in Strike and less bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.
• Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike by taking industry-leading security measures to protect you and your account.
• Supporting our user's matters. We have a stellar customer support team staffed with kindhearted individuals. We are here to help, always.

Strike allows users to withdraw funds from Strike to their bank account. As a merchant, you can now accept bitcoin as payment and withdraw your funds as fiat. You are never exposed to price volatility or taxes because you never custody anything besides US dollars.

What do people use Strike for?
• Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in Strike and more bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in Strike and less bitcoin in your wallet.
• Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.
• Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike by taking industry-leading security measures to protect you and your account.
• Supporting our user's matters. We have a stellar customer support team staffed with kindhearted individuals. We are here to help, always.

descriptionShort: Strike is the quickest and easiest way to send money anywhere in the world.
title: Strike: Bitcoin & Lightning Payments

creator: Zap
descriptionHtml:
Strike is the easiest way to send, spend, remit, and invest your money. Onboard in seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Simply link a payment method, deposit funds, and let us take care of the rest.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, and make payments with friends.

Buy Bitcoin
Strike is the easiest way to buy bitcoin. Strike makes buying bitcoin simple and cheap: link a payment method and you're a few clicks away from owning bitcoin. Track the price of bitcoin in real time in your app and get started by buying as little as $5 worth of bitcoin.

Cheap and Fast Remittance Payments
Send money anywhere in the world in seconds, at no cost. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your USD and Receive Bitcoin as USD
By using Strike to make or receive bitcoin payments, Strike users can interact with the Bitcoin network while avoiding dealing with volatility, the tax consequences of spending bitcoin, or the need to set up a wallet and own bitcoin. With Strike, you can spend your US dollars as bitcoin, instantly. You can also accept bitcoin payments and receive the funds in your account as dollars. Just link a bank account, deposit funds, and use our bitcoin to make or receive instant transfers.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike debit card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back—security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is standing by to answer your questions.
We’re here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

By using Strike to make or receive bitcoin payments, Strike users can interact with the Bitcoin network while avoiding dealing with volatility, the tax consequences of spending bitcoin, or the need to set up a wallet and own bitcoin. With Strike, you can spend your US dollars as bitcoin, instantly. You can also accept bitcoin payments and receive the funds in your account as dollars. Just link a bank account, deposit funds, and use our bitcoin to make or receive instant transfers.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike debit card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back—security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is standing by to answer your questions.
We’re here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title: Strike: Bitcoin & Payments

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Send money instantly, anywhere in the world. Onboard in under 30 seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Link a bank account to deposit funds and let us do the rest.

Remittance Payments
Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no added fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in your account and more bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in your account and less bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike debit card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our user's matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no added fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in your account and more bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in your account and less bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike debit card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our user's matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title: Strike: Bitcoin & Payments

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Send money instantly, anywhere in the world. Onboard in under 30 seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Link a bank account to deposit funds and let us do the rest.

Remittance Payments
Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no added fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used by thousands to buy bitcoin - Create an invoice from your existing wallet and pay it. After completion, you'll have less fiat in your account and more bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands to sell bitcoin - Create a request in Strike and send to it from your wallet. After completion, you'll have more fiat in your account and less bitcoin in your wallet.

Strike is used by thousands for internet tipping - Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Strike is used by thousands for micropayments - Ever made a $0.01 online payment? With Strike you can. Just scan the QR code and click pay.

Still reading? Check this out.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with VISA and will soon offer the Strike debit card so you can earn rewards with partnered merchants and take your Strike app shopping anywhere at any time.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our user's matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title: Strike: Bitcoin & Payments

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Send funds instantly, anywhere in the world. Onboard in under 30 seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Link a bank account to deposit funds and let us do the rest.

Remittance Payments
Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no added fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

Remittance Payments
Scan a QR code, click pay, and send money to the other side of the world in seconds with no added fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

Spend Bitcoin With Your US Dollars
With Strike you can spend bitcoin anywhere, instantly. Strike users don't have to deal with volatility, taxes, the need to set up a wallet, or the need to own bitcoin to interact with the Bitcoin economy. Just simply link a bank account to the app, deposit funds, and spend ours.

Withdraw Fiat To Your Bank
You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

You can withdraw funds from your account to your bank account. By holding your funds in dollars, you don’t have to be exposed to bitcoin price volatility or tax implications.

What do people use Strike for?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

We're more than just a payment app.

• We've partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We've got your back--security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is here to help, always.

Custody of your funds and bitcoin trading are offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title: Strike: Bitcoin & Payments

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Strike is the easiest way to send, spend, remit, and invest your money. Onboard in seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Simply link a payment method, deposit funds, and let us take care of the rest.

WHAT DO PEOPLE USE STRIKE FOR?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

BUY BITCOIN
Strike is the easiest way to buy bitcoin. Strike makes buying bitcoin simple and cheap: link a payment method and you’re a few clicks away from owning bitcoin. Track the price of bitcoin in real time in your app or with the Strike widget and get started by buying as little as $5 worth of bitcoin.

GET PAID IN BITCOIN
Time is money. Convert the time you spend working into money that works for you. With Strike you can convert any percent of your paycheck, tax return, unemployment benefits, and more into bitcoin for no transaction fees using your account and routing number. The portion you specify will automatically be converted into bitcoin and accessible within Strike.

CHEAP AND FAST REMITTANCE PAYMENTS
Send funds anywhere in the world in seconds with no transaction fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

SPEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR USD AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS USD
By using Strike to make or receive bitcoin payments, Strike users can interact with the Bitcoin network while avoiding dealing with volatility, the tax consequences of spending bitcoin, or the need to set up a wallet and own bitcoin. With Strike, you can spend your US dollars as bitcoin, instantly. You can also accept bitcoin payments and receive the funds in your account as dollars. Just link a bank account, deposit funds, and use our bitcoin to make or receive instant transfers.


Still reading? Check this out.

We’re more than just a payment app.
• We’ve partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We’ve got your back—security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is standing by to answer your questions. We’re here to help, always.

Custody of your funds is offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Strike is the easiest way to send, spend, remit, and invest your money. Onboard in seconds and unlock the future of digital payments. Simply link a payment method, deposit funds, and let us take care of the rest.

WHAT DO PEOPLE USE STRIKE FOR?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

BUY BITCOIN
Strike is the easiest way to buy bitcoin. Strike makes buying bitcoin simple and cheap: link a payment method and you’re a few clicks away from owning bitcoin. Track the price of bitcoin in real time in your app or with the Strike widget and get started by buying as little as $5 worth of bitcoin.

GET PAID IN BITCOIN
Time is money. Convert the time you spend working into money that works for you. With Strike you can convert any percent of your paycheck, tax return, unemployment benefits, and more into bitcoin for no transaction fees using your account and routing number. The portion you specify will automatically be converted into bitcoin and accessible within Strike.

CHEAP AND FAST REMITTANCE PAYMENTS
Send funds anywhere in the world in seconds with no transaction fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

SPEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR USD AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS USD
By using Strike to make or receive bitcoin payments, Strike users can interact with the Bitcoin network while avoiding dealing with volatility, the tax consequences of spending bitcoin, or the need to set up a wallet and own bitcoin. With Strike, you can spend your US dollars as bitcoin, instantly. You can also accept bitcoin payments and receive the funds in your account as dollars. Just link a bank account, deposit funds, and use our bitcoin to make or receive instant transfers.


Still reading? Check this out.

We’re more than just a payment app.
• We’ve partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We’ve got your back—security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is standing by to answer your questions. We’re here to help, always.

Custody of your funds is offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

WHAT DO PEOPLE USE STRIKE FOR?
Strike is used to buy and sell bitcoin, tip on the web, send and receive micropayments, remit money, pay merchants for goods and services, and make payments with friends.

BUY BITCOIN
Strike is the easiest way to buy bitcoin. Strike makes buying bitcoin simple and cheap: link a payment method and you’re a few clicks away from owning bitcoin. Track the price of bitcoin in real time in your app or with the Strike widget and get started by buying as little as $5 worth of bitcoin.

GET PAID IN BITCOIN
Time is money. Convert the time you spend working into money that works for you. With Strike you can convert any percent of your paycheck, tax return, unemployment benefits, and more into bitcoin for no transaction fees using your account and routing number. The portion you specify will automatically be converted into bitcoin and accessible within Strike.

CHEAP AND FAST REMITTANCE PAYMENTS
Send funds anywhere in the world in seconds with no transaction fees. Goodbye TransferWise. Goodbye Western Union.

SPEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR USD AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS USD
By using Strike to make or receive bitcoin payments, Strike users can interact with the Bitcoin network while avoiding dealing with volatility, the tax consequences of spending bitcoin, or the need to set up a wallet and own bitcoin. With Strike, you can spend your US dollars as bitcoin, instantly. You can also accept bitcoin payments and receive the funds in your account as dollars. Just link a bank account, deposit funds, and use our bitcoin to make or receive instant transfers.


Still reading? Check this out.

We’re more than just a payment app.
• We’ve partnered with Visa and will soon offer the Strike card that works just like a debit card, so you can earn rewards and shop with your Strike app anywhere Visa is accepted.
• We’ve got your back—security is a top priority for us, and we are driven to ensure you feel safe and secure when using Strike.
• Supporting our users matters. Our customer support team is standing by to answer your questions. We’re here to help, always.

Custody of your funds is offered through Prime Trust, LLC. Your bitcoin is not protected by FDIC deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title: Strike: Bitcoin & Payments

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Strike is the global money app for fast, safe payments, and bitcoin.

Download Strike and connect your money to the world around you. Create an account in seconds and start using Strike to send money domestically or abroad, buy bitcoin, and pay friends.

SEND AND RECEIVE MONEY INSTANTLY
Effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, anywhere in the world — in seconds.

BUY AND SELL BITCOIN
Get started with as little as one cent and enjoy the flexibility of buying and selling any amount of bitcoin. Set up recurring purchases, withdraw bitcoin to your preferred wallet, and grow your bitcoin holdings with ease.

SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Bitcoin made simple - Use the cash in your account to pay any bitcoin or lightning invoice. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance. No taxes, no volatility. With Strike, your money goes farther, faster, and anywhere you want.

RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS*
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a lightning request. The bitcoin is securely held in your Strike bitcoin balance, giving you full control over your bitcoin.

SEND GLOBALLY*
Lightning fast, secure, global money transfers — send cash directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries. There are no transaction fees when you Send Globally, ensuring more money makes it home.

GET PAID IN BITCOIN*
Automatically convert a portion or all of your paycheck into bitcoin using your account and routing number. Choose the percentage that suits your needs, from 1% to 100% of your pay.


—-----------------------------------------
*Feature only available in supported regions.

The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions due to potential or actual regulatory restrictions.

For customers outside the U.S., your “cash” or “USDT” balance in your account is held in Tether (also known as "USDT"), not in any fiat currency. When we refer to “cash” in the app, we do so only for convenience, and references to “cash” should be interpreted to mean USDT.

Your bitcoin (or, if you’re not in the U.S., USDT) is not protected by deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

Lightning fast, secure, international money transfers – send cash directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries like Mexico, the Philippines, Nigeria, and more. No added transaction fees for you, so more money makes it home.

BUY, SELL, SEND & RECEIVE BITCOIN
Get started with as little as $0.01. Buy and sell any amount of bitcoin without any added transaction fees. Use the Lightning Network to instantly pay any invoice, anywhere (even those who don’t have Strike), with either bitcoin or cash.

BUY BTC HOURLY, OR SMASH BUY
Grow your bitcoin stack, without stressing about timing the market. Set up recurring purchases hourly, daily, weekly or monthly, and send bitcoin to your own custody You can also buy up to $25,000 of bitcoin directly from a linked bank account in one go (restrictions may apply).

SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Use either your cash or bitcoin to pay any bitcoin address or Lightning request. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance. No taxes, no volatility.

RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS*
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a Lightning request. The bitcoin is securely held in your Strike bitcoin balance.

PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.

SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST
At Strike, we take the protection of your funds very seriously. Strike owns and operates all of its own infrastructure. This reduces counterparty risk and ensures the robustness of our products.

-----------------------------------------
*Feature only available in supported regions.

The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions due to potential or actual regulatory restrictions.

For customers outside the U.S., your “cash” or “USDT” balance in your account is held in Tether (also known as "USDT"), not in any fiat currency. When we refer to “cash” in the app, we do so only for convenience, and references to “cash” should be interpreted to mean USDT.

Your bitcoin and USD (or, if you’re not in the U.S., USDT) is not protected by deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Strike is the simple, fast, and secure way to send money globally and buy bitcoin, with no transaction fees. Create an account in seconds and connect your money to the world around you.

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY*
Lightning fast, secure, international money transfers – send cash directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries like Mexico, the Philippines, Nigeria, and more. No added transaction fees for you, so more money makes it home.

BUY, SELL, SEND & RECEIVE BITCOIN
Get started with as little as $0.01. Buy and sell any amount of bitcoin without any added transaction fees. Use the Lightning Network to instantly pay any invoice, anywhere (even those who don’t have Strike), with either bitcoin or cash.

BUY BTC HOURLY, OR SMASH BUY
Grow your bitcoin stack, without stressing about timing the market. Set up recurring purchases hourly, daily, weekly or monthly, and send bitcoin to your own custody You can also buy up to $25,000 of bitcoin directly from a linked bank account in one go (restrictions may apply).

SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Use either your cash or bitcoin to pay any bitcoin address or Lightning request. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance. No taxes, no volatility.

RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS*
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a Lightning request. The bitcoin is securely held in your Strike bitcoin balance.

PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.

SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST
At Strike, we take the protection of your funds very seriously. Strike owns and operates all of its own infrastructure. This reduces counterparty risk and ensures the robustness of our products.

-----------------------------------------
*Feature only available in supported regions.

The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions due to potential or actual regulatory restrictions.

For customers outside the U.S., your “cash” or “USDT” balance in your account is held in Tether (also known as "USDT"), not in any fiat currency. When we refer to “cash” in the app, we do so only for convenience, and references to “cash” should be interpreted to mean USDT.

Your bitcoin and USD (or, if you’re not in the U.S., USDT) is not protected by deposit insurance protection. All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

DEPOSIT UNLIMITED FUNDS WITH WIRES*
Wire transfers are unlimited, have no incoming fees from Strike, and are typically available within one business day. (Note: Your bank may charge a fee to send outgoing wires.)

SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Use either your cash or bitcoin to pay any Bitcoin address or Lightning request. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance. No taxes, no volatility.

RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a Bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a Lightning request. The bitcoin is securely held in your Strike bitcoin balance.

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Lightning fast, secure, international money transfers – send cash directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries like Mexico, the Philippines, Kenya, and more.

USE BITCOIN FOR DAILY LIFE
Use your bitcoin to buy gift cards of your favorite stores, pay for streaming services, and top up your phone.

PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.

SECURITY IS THE PRIORITY
Your cash and bitcoin are always held securely and fully backed 1:1.

---

* Feature only available in supported regions

The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features, and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions.

For customers outside the U.S., your “cash” or “USDT” balance in your account is held in Tether (also known as “USDT”), not in any fiat currency. When we refer to “cash” in the app, we do so only for convenience, and references to “cash” should be interpreted to mean USDT.

All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

Or, buy up to $25,000 of bitcoin directly from a linked payment method or your cash balance, in one go (restrictions may apply).

GET PAID IN BITCOIN*
Deposit a little of your paycheck, or go all in – you choose the percentage of bitcoin. With direct deposits, you don’t have to worry about deposit limits.

DEPOSIT UNLIMITED FUNDS WITH WIRES*
Wire transfers are unlimited, have no incoming fees from Strike, and are typically available within one business day. (Note: Your bank may charge a fee to send outgoing wires.)

SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Use either your cash or bitcoin to pay any Bitcoin address or Lightning request. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance. No taxes, no volatility.

RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a Bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a Lightning request. The bitcoin is securely held in your Strike bitcoin balance.

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Lightning fast, secure, international money transfers – send cash directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries like Mexico, the Philippines, Kenya, and more.

USE BITCOIN FOR DAILY LIFE
Use your bitcoin to buy gift cards of your favorite stores, pay for streaming services, and top up your phone.

PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.

SECURITY IS THE PRIORITY
Your cash and bitcoin are always held securely and fully backed 1:1.

---

* Feature only available in supported regions

The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features, and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions.

For customers outside the U.S., your “cash” or “USDT” balance in your account is held in Tether (also known as “USDT”), not in any fiat currency. When we refer to “cash” in the app, we do so only for convenience, and references to “cash” should be interpreted to mean USDT.

All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

title:
STRIKE: Bitcoin & Global Money
v2.50

creator: Zap Solutions Holdings, Inc
descriptionHtml:
STRIKE: BITCOIN.
Buy, sell, send, withdraw.


Strike is your simple, fast, and reliable way to buy bitcoin and send money globally. Sign up in seconds and get started with as little as a cent.


BUY BTC HOURLY, OR ALL AT ONCE
Grow your bitcoin stack without stressing about timing the market. Set up automatic purchases of bitcoin hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly, and send bitcoin straight to your own custody. Or, buy at the current price in just a few taps (restrictions may apply). The more bitcoin you buy or sell, the cheaper your fees.


SAFETY & SECURITY
Your cash and bitcoin are always held for you by Strike 1:1. We don’t lend your bitcoin, ever.


FREE ON-CHAIN WITHDRAWALS
With Strike, you can manage on-chain fees on your terms. When you initiate an on-chain payment with Strike, you are given three options for both fees and speed of settlement: Priority, Standard, and Flexible.


SEND BITCOIN WITH YOUR CASH AND RECEIVE BITCOIN AS CASH
Use either your cash or bitcoin to pay any Bitcoin address or Lightning request. Send bitcoin using your cash balance and receive bitcoin payments as cash in your cash balance.


RECEIVE BITCOIN ON-CHAIN OR VIA LIGHTNING REQUESTS
Easily request and deposit bitcoin from a Bitcoin address (on-chain) or through a Lightning request. You can receive payments either as cash or bitcoin, you choose.


GET PAID IN BITCOIN*
Convert just a slice of your paycheck into bitcoin, or the whole thing. Choose the percent you want in bitcoin, and adjust at any time.


BUY LARGE AMOUNTS OF BITCOIN WITH WIRE DEPOSITS*
Wire transfers are unlimited, have no incoming fees from Strike, and are typically available within one business day. (Note: Your bank may charge a fee to send outgoing wires.)


SEND MONEY GLOBALLY*
Lightning fast, low-cost, global money transfers – send directly to mobile money or bank accounts in supported countries like Mexico, the Philippines, Kenya, and more.


USE BITCOIN FOR DAILY LIFE
Use your bitcoin to buy gift cards of your favorite stores, pay for streaming services, and top up your phone.


PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.


---


* Feature only available in certain regions for eligible customers


The availability of the Strike App is subject to jurisdictional limitations. Strike may not offer the Strike App or certain products, features, and/or services on the Strike App in certain jurisdictions. Please see our Terms of Service for more information.


All investments involve risk, including the possible loss of principal.

SECURITY

FREE ON-CHAIN WITHDRAWALS
With Strike, you can manage on-chain fees on your terms. When you initiate an on-chain payment with Strike, you are given three options for both fees and speed of settlement: Priority, Standard, and Flexible.

USE BITCOIN FOR DAILY LIFE
Use your bitcoin to buy gift cards of your favorite stores, pay for streaming services, and top up your phone.


PAY ANYONE AND EVERYONE
Whether it’s in cash or bitcoin, effortlessly pay friends, split bills, or send gifts to anyone on Strike, across the world.


BITCOIN-BACKED LOANS*
Strike offers bitcoin-backed personal loans to customers in select U.S. states. You must have an active Strike account in good standing to be eligible for a loan. Loans range from $100,000 to $2,000,000 with a term of 12 months and a maximum initial loan-to-value (LTV) ratio of 50%. There are no origination, early repayment, or late payment fees, but liquidation fees may apply. The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is 12% if you elect to make monthly payments or 12.284% if you elect to repay the entire loan at maturity. For example, if you choose to repay the entire loan at maturity and receive a $100,000 loan, the total amount you will pay is $113,000 (due to compounding on deferred monthly payments), assuming you maintain the required LTV for the duration of the loan and do not incur any liquidation fees. Strike loans are made by Zap Solutions Capital, Inc., an exempt subsidiary of Zap Solutions, Inc., and are subject to a loan agreement. All loan offers require application and approval; see Strike Terms of Service and loan terms for additional details.


---
